title: Meditation Wall Art - Balance
description: Welcome to Mindful Walls - Our Meditation Wall Art Gallery. Every piece of art in Mindful Walls is made in-house in the USA! We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you.
cleaned_text: Balance 24/7 Shipping Info *Covid-19 Update*: [Click Here](https://mindfulwalls.com/pages/shipping-info) The idea behind the "Balance 24/7" Life without balance can harm your health! A stack of rocks is called a cairn. Cairn is a form of worship and a way to commune with the forces of nature to ask for balance in life. Cairns symbolize, balance, peace, patience, simplicity, spirituality, and prayer. Some religious traditions use them as parts of rituals or to mark spots for a person to stop and meditate. BRING THE BALANCE INTO YOUR LIFE! Gallery-Style Durability Museum-quality prints made on thick and durable matte paper. Each print is giclée-printed on archival, acid-free paper that yields. Framed Print: Every print is made in house in the USA Paper thickness: 10.3 mil Paper weight: 5.57 oz/y² (189 g/m²) Giclée printing quality Please note: Not all computer monitors are the same and colors and contrast may vary slightly from the finished product.
